text: The Râușor (in its upper course also: Boteanu) is a right tributary of the river Dâmbovița in Romania. It flows into the Dâmbovița in Rucăr.Trasee turistice - județul Argeș Its length is and its basin size is . ==Tributaries== The following rivers are tributaries to the river Râușor (from source to mouth): *Left: Valea Lupului *Right: Bugheanu, Măra, Purdel, Strâmba, Orzea, Grozea, Valea Râsului, Cămârzanu, Pârâul Podurilor, Valea Andreiașului ==References== Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Argeș County
title: Râușor (Dâmbovița)
